name: Detective Story (itch) (VM games)
description:
To find the killer, you will need not only to show your powers of observation, but also to listen carefully to the answers to your tricky questions of potential participants in the crime. You, as an experienced detective, of course, will write down all the answers of the people you interviewed in a special notebook, thanks to which you will determine the motive for the crime and answer the main question "Who is the killer?".

After collecting information, you will come to court and issue a verdict, who is the villain who committed this act.

An easy game that will help you or your child pass the time while you drink tea and stimulate your gray cells, and the musical accompaniment will give you the right mood to complete this game.

If you want to support this project, you can transfer a coin to Qiwi: qiwi.com/n/VMQIWI
